images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, young Japanese model, exuding a cool and independent aura. She’s framed in an extreme close-up on her large, expressive eyes – an innocent, captivating gaze. She wears a slightly oversized, light-wash denim jacket layered over a delicate, ivory lace crop top, revealing a hint of her toned midriff. High-waisted, light-blue distressed denim shorts complete the look. A sleek, black leather designer handbag rests casually on her lap. The setting is a luxuriously appointed hotel room, with soft, diffused daylight streaming in. Focus is razor-sharp on her eyes, with a creamy bokeh blur softening the background – suggesting a stylish hotel lobby visible through a large window. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, depth of field, ray tracing, global illumination, black and white classic portrait, realistic skin texture, visible pores, faint vellus hair.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup

A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful young Japanese woman, embodying a top-tier gravure idol aesthetic, captured in front of a large gym mirror during golden hour. She’s styled in an oversized, heather grey cashmere hoodie—slightly pulled off one shoulder revealing a hint of skin—paired with high-waisted, dark wash denim shorts that accentuate her slim waist and curvy hips. The hoodie’s soft texture contrasts with the smooth denim. She’s holding a modern smartphone, angled as if taking a mirror selfie, a gentle, soft smile playing on her lips. Her long, straight, raven-black hair cascades down her back. The gym background is subtly blurred (bokeh), showcasing minimalist design and diffused sunlight. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, emphasizing depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination for incredibly realistic skin texture – visible pores and fine vellus hair are crucial – creating a cool, independent, and subtly seductive mood with desaturated, muted tones.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
